This report gives the distribution of all Module 2 responses for those that completed either version 1 or version 2 of this survey. If a participant was somehow able to complete both versions, only the version 2 data is kept.

```{r intro, include=FALSE}
# All libraries are listed up top; authentication for BQ will be necessary
# Functions used included before the start of the analysis 

```

```{r merge1, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Data Dictionary for column names
dictionary <- rio::import("https://episphere.github.io/conceptGithubActions/aggregate.json",format = "json")
dd <- dplyr::bind_rows(dictionary,.id="CID")
dd <-rbindlist(dictionary,fill=TRUE,use.names=TRUE,idcol="CID")
dd$`Variable Label`[is.na(dd$`Variable Label`)] <- replace_na(dd$'Variable Name')
dd <- as.data.frame.matrix(do.call("rbind",dictionary)) 
dd$CID <- rownames(dd)
#https://shaivyakodan.medium.com/7-useful-r-packages-for-analysis-7f60d28dca98
devtools::install_github("tidyverse/reprex")





## BQ Pull from the participants table just to use for versioning
project <- "nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04"
billing <- "nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04" 
recr_M1 <- bq_project_query(project, query="SELECT token,Connect_ID, d_821247024, d_914594314,  d_827220437,d_512820379,
                            d_949302066 , d_517311251  FROM  `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.participants_JP` WHERE  d_821247024='197316935' and d_949302066 ='231311385'")
recr_m1 <- bq_table_download(recr_M1,bigint = "integer64")
cnames <- names(recr_m1)
# Check that it doesn't match any non-number
numbers_only <- function(x) !grepl("\\D", x)
# to check variables in recr_noinact_wl1
for (i in 1: length(cnames)){
  varname <- cnames[i]
  var<-pull(recr_m1,varname)
  recr_m1[,cnames[i]] <- ifelse(numbers_only(var), as.numeric(as.character(var)), var)
}




#### Handling participants that somehow completed both Mod1 version 1 and Mod1 version 2

sql_M1_1 <- bq_project_query(project, query = "SELECT Connect_ID, D_407056417, D_750420077_D_108025529, D_750420077_D_434651539, D_750420077_D_505282171, D_750420077_D_578416151, D_750420077_D_846483618, D_613744428 FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.module1_v1_JP` WHERE Connect_ID IS NOT NULL")
sql_M1_2 <- bq_project_query(project, query = "SELECT Connect_ID, D_407056417, D_750420077_D_108025529, D_750420077_D_434651539, D_750420077_D_505282171, D_750420077_D_578416151, D_750420077_D_582784267, D_750420077_D_700100953, D_750420077_D_751402477, D_750420077_D_846483618,  D_613744428 FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.module1_v2_JP` WHERE Connect_ID IS NOT NULL")

M1_V1 <- bq_table_download(sql_M1_1, bigint = "integer64")
M1_V2 <- bq_table_download(sql_M1_2, bigint = "integer64")

# Select matching column names
M1_V1_vars <- colnames(M1_V1)
M1_V2_vars <- colnames(M1_V2)
common_vars <- intersect(M1_V1_vars, M1_V2_vars)

# Subset to common columns
M1_V1_common <- M1_V1[, common_vars]
M1_V2_common <- M1_V2[, common_vars]

# Add version indicator
M1_V1_common$version <- 1
M1_V2_common$version <- 2

# Identify columns with mismatched types
mismatched_cols <- names(M1_V1_common)[sapply(names(M1_V1_common), function(col) {
  class(M1_V1_common[[col]]) != class(M1_V2_common[[col]])
})]

# Convert mismatched columns to character for consistency
M1_V1_common <- M1_V1_common %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(mismatched_cols), as.character))
M1_V2_common <- M1_V2_common %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(mismatched_cols), as.character))

# Combine both versions for participants who completed both
M1_common <- bind_rows(M1_V1_common, M1_V2_common) %>%
  arrange(Connect_ID, desc(version))

# For columns unique to each version
V1_only_vars <- setdiff(M1_V1_vars, common_vars)
V2_only_vars <- setdiff(M1_V2_vars, common_vars)

# Subset each version for unique columns and add version indicator
m1_v1_only <- M1_V1[, c("Connect_ID", V1_only_vars)] %>%
  mutate(version = 1)
m1_v2_only <- M1_V2[, c("Connect_ID", V2_only_vars)] %>%
  mutate(version = 2)

# Combine the unique and common data
m1_common_v1 <- left_join(M1_common, m1_v1_only, by = c("Connect_ID", "version"))
m1_combined_v1v2 <- left_join(m1_common_v1, m1_v2_only, by = c("Connect_ID", "version"))

# Filter for complete cases where specific completion criteria are met
m1_complete <- m1_combined_v1v2 %>%
  filter(Connect_ID %in% recr_m1$Connect_ID[recr_m1$d_949302066 == 231311385]) %>%
  arrange(desc(version))

# Remove duplicates, keeping only the most recent version for each Connect_ID
m1_complete_nodup <- m1_complete[!duplicated(m1_complete$Connect_ID),]

m1_complete_nodup$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(m1_complete_nodup$Connect_ID)


## Define requirements of the data: active or passive,  user profile done, consented, mod1 done, verified
parts <- "SELECT Connect_ID, token, state_d_934298480, d_536735468, d_663265240,d_976570371, d_949302066,
FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.participants_JP` 
where Connect_ID IS NOT NULL and (d_512820379='486306141' OR d_512820379='854703046') and d_919254129='353358909' and d_699625233='353358909' and 
d_536735468 = '231311385'  and d_821247024='197316935'" 

parts_table <- bq_project_query(project, parts)
parts_data <- bq_table_download(parts_table, bigint = "integer64",n_max = Inf, page_size = 10000)

parts_data$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(parts_data$Connect_ID)


merged= left_join(parts_data,m1_complete_nodup, by="Connect_ID") #%>% 
dim(merged)


data_tib_base <- as_tibble(merged)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment = NA)
```

```{r merge2, include=FALSE}
### Deal with Mod2 duplicates (took both version 1 and vesion 2, and only select version 2 data)
sql_M2_1 <- bq_project_query(project, query = "SELECT * FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.module2_v1_JP` WHERE Connect_ID IS NOT NULL")
sql_M2_2 <- bq_project_query(project, query = "SELECT * FROM `nih-nci-dceg-connect-prod-6d04.FlatConnect.module2_v2_JP` WHERE Connect_ID IS NOT NULL")

M2_V1 <- bq_table_download(sql_M2_1, bigint = "integer64")
M2_V2 <- bq_table_download(sql_M2_2, bigint = "integer64")

# Select matching column names
M2_V1_vars <- colnames(M2_V1)
M2_V2_vars <- colnames(M2_V2)
common_vars <- intersect(M2_V1_vars, M2_V2_vars)

# Subset to common columns
M2_V1_common <- M2_V1[, common_vars]
M2_V2_common <- M2_V2[, common_vars]

# Add version indicator
M2_V1_common$version <- 1
M2_V2_common$version <- 2

# Identify columns with mismatched types
mismatched_cols <- names(M2_V1_common)[sapply(names(M2_V1_common), function(col) {
  class(M2_V1_common[[col]]) != class(M2_V2_common[[col]])
})]

# Convert mismatched columns to character for consistency
M2_V1_common <- M2_V1_common %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(mismatched_cols), as.character))
M2_V2_common <- M2_V2_common %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(mismatched_cols), as.character))

# Combine both versions for participants who completed both
M2_common <- bind_rows(M2_V1_common, M2_V2_common) %>%
  arrange(Connect_ID, desc(version))

# For columns unique to each version
V1_only_vars <- setdiff(M2_V1_vars, common_vars)
V2_only_vars <- setdiff(M2_V2_vars, common_vars)

# Subset each version for unique columns and add version indicator
m2_v1_only <- M2_V1[, c("Connect_ID", V1_only_vars)] %>%
  mutate(version = 1)
m2_v2_only <- M2_V2[, c("Connect_ID", V2_only_vars)] %>%
  mutate(version = 2)

# Combine the unique and common data
M2_common_v1 <- left_join(M2_common, m2_v1_only, by = c("Connect_ID", "version"))
M2_combined_v1v2 <- left_join(M2_common_v1, m2_v2_only, by = c("Connect_ID", "version"))

# Filter for complete cases where specific completion criteria are met
M2_complete <- M2_combined_v1v2 %>%
  filter(Connect_ID %in% recr_m2$Connect_ID[recr_m2$d_536735468 == 231311385]) %>%
  arrange(desc(version))

# Remove duplicates, keeping only the most recent version for each Connect_ID
M2_complete_nodup <- M2_complete[!duplicated(M2_complete$Connect_ID),]
table(M2_complete_nodup$version)


M2_complete_nodup$Connect_ID <- as.numeric(M2_complete_nodup$Connect_ID)


module2= left_join(merged, M2_complete_nodup, by="Connect_ID")


data_tib_m2 <- as_tibble(module2)
```

```{r functions, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE,  message=FALSE, include=FALSE}
hist_funct <- function(CID,Title, Xlab, Ylab) {
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  module2 %>% mutate(!!CID_SYM:=as.numeric(!!CID_SYM)) %>% 
    filter(!is.na(!!CID_SYM)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=!!CID_SYM))+
    xlab(Xlab) + ylab(Ylab) + geom_histogram()+  ggtitle(Title)+
    geom_histogram(color="black")+ scale_y_continuous(breaks=pretty_breaks()) + 
    geom_vline(aes(xintercept=mean(!!CID_SYM, na.rm=T)), colour="#2973A5", linetype="solid")
  
}

#GT table for questions asked to all (no skip logic)
simple_funct2 <- function(CID, Title){  
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  dt_select <- data_tib_m2 %>%  select(Connect_ID, !!CID_SYM)
  gt_yn <- dt_select  %>% dplyr::group_by(!!CID_SYM) %>% dplyr::summarize(n=n(), percentage=100*n/nrow(.)) %>% dplyr::ungroup() %>% dplyr::mutate(answer=recode(!!CID_SYM, !!!dict)) %>% replace_na(list(answer="Skipped this Question")) %>%  dplyr::select(answer, n, percentage)
  
  gt_yn %>%  gt::gt()  %>%  
    fmt_number(columns = "percentage", decimals = 2) %>% 
    tab_header(title = md(Title)) %>% 
    cols_label(n= md("**N**"), answer = md("**Answer**"), percentage = md("**%**")) %>%  
    grand_summary_rows(columns=c(n, percentage),fns = ~sum(.,na.rm = T))|>
    tab_options(
      stub.font.weight = "bold"
    ) %>%
    tab_style(
      style = list(
        cell_text(weight = "bold")
      ),
      locations = cells_body(
        columns = answer,
      )
    ) #
}

#GT table with one filter/skip logic
one_logic_funct2 <- function(CID, CID_prev, Prev_Answer, Title){  
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  CID_SYM_P <- rlang::ensym(CID_prev)
  dt_select <- data_tib_m2 %>%  filter(!!CID_SYM_P == Prev_Answer) %>%  select(Connect_ID, !!CID_SYM) 
  gt_yn <- dt_select  %>% dplyr::group_by(!!CID_SYM) %>% dplyr::summarize(n=n(), percentage=100*n/nrow(.)) %>% dplyr::ungroup() %>% dplyr::mutate(answer=recode(!!CID_SYM, !!!dict)) %>% replace_na(list(answer="Skipped this Question")) %>%  dplyr::select(answer, n, percentage)
  
  gt_yn %>%  gt::gt(rowname_col = "row_lab")  %>%  
    #opt_table_float(value = FALSE) %>% ## avoiding latex rendering issue
  fmt_number(columns = "percentage", decimals = 2) %>% 
  tab_header(title = md(Title)) %>% 
  cols_label(n= md("**N**"),  answer = md("**Answer**"), percentage = md("**%**")) %>% 
    grand_summary_rows(columns=c(n, percentage),fns = ~sum(.,na.rm = T))|>
  tab_options(
      stub.font.weight = "bold"
    ) %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_text(weight = "bold")
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = answer,
    )
  ) 
}

#GT table with four filter/skip logics
four_skip_funct2 <- function(CID, Title, CID_prev, Prev_Answer1, Prev_Answer2, Prev_Answer3, Prev_Answer4){  
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  CID_SYM_P <- rlang::ensym(CID_prev)
  dt_select <- data_tib_m2 %>%  filter(!!CID_SYM_P == Prev_Answer1 | !!CID_SYM_P == Prev_Answer2| 
                                           !!CID_SYM_P == Prev_Answer3 | !!CID_SYM_P == Prev_Answer4) %>%  
    select(Connect_ID, !!CID_SYM) 
  gt_yn <- dt_select  %>% dplyr::group_by(!!CID_SYM) %>% dplyr::summarize(n=n(), percentage=100*n/nrow(.)) %>% dplyr::ungroup() %>% dplyr::mutate(answer=recode(!!CID_SYM, !!!dict)) %>% replace_na(list(answer="Skipped this Question")) %>%  dplyr::select(answer, n, percentage)
  
  gt_yn %>%  gt::gt(rowname_col = "row_lab")  %>%  
  fmt_number(columns = "percentage", decimals = 2) %>% 
  tab_header(title = md(Title)) %>% 
  cols_label(n= md("**N**"),  answer = md("**Answer**"), percentage = md("**%**")) %>% 
  # summary_rows( groups=F,
  #   column = c(n,percentage),
  #   fns= list(
  #     Sum= ~sum(.)
  #   ), decimals=0) %>%
    grand_summary_rows(columns=c(n, percentage),fns = ~sum(.,na.rm = T))|>
  tab_options(
      stub.font.weight = "bold"
    ) %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_text(weight = "bold")
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = answer,
    )
  ) 
}



#Bar-- attemting to replace failing histograms 
bar_rplc_funct <- function(CID,Title, Xlab, Ylab) {
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  module2 %>% filter(!is.na(!!CID_SYM)) %>% mutate(as.numeric(as.character(!!CID_SYM))) %>%  
    ggplot(aes(x=!!CID_SYM))+ ylab(Ylab) + xlab(Xlab) +
    geom_bar()+  ggtitle(Title)
}


bar_rplc_funct_F <- function(CID,Title, Xlab, Ylab) {
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  module2 %>% filter(!is.na(!!CID_SYM)) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=!!CID_SYM))+ ylab(Ylab) + xlab(Xlab) +
    geom_bar()+  ggtitle(Title)
}


#Boxplot for female at birth only questions
boxp_funct_F <- function(CID,Title, Xlab) {
  CID_SYM <- rlang::ensym(CID)
  module2 %>% mutate(!!CID_SYM:=as.numeric(!!CID_SYM)) %>%
    filter(!is.na(!!CID_SYM)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=!!CID_SYM))+
    xlab(Xlab) + geom_boxplot()+  ggtitle(Title)+
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::number_format(accuracy = 0.01))
}
``` 

```{r PainMedsTable, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#   )
mds_flags <- data_tib_m2 %>%
  mutate(
    Baby_Aspirin = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_469512398 == 1),
    Regular_Aspirin = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_194424439 == 1),
    Ibuprofen = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_422188606 == 1),
    Acetaminophen = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_555555502 == 1),
    Naproxen = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_800410166 == 1),
    Celebrex = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_221645137 == 1),
    Prescription_Pain_Relievers = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_974248369 == 1),
    None = as.numeric(D_399982309_D_535003378 == 1),
    # Skipped: flag if all medication columns are 0 or NA
    Skipped = if_else(
      rowSums(select(., starts_with("D_399982309_D_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)), na.rm = TRUE) == 0 &
      rowSums(!is.na(select(., starts_with("D_399982309_D_")))) == 0, 1, 0)
  )



mds_long <- mds_flags %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Baby_Aspirin"):starts_with("Skipped"),
               names_to = "Medication", values_to = "Flag") %>%
  filter(Flag == 1) %>%
  mutate(Medication = case_when(
    Medication == "Baby_Aspirin" ~ "Baby Aspirin",
    Medication == "Regular_Aspirin" ~ "Regular Aspirin",
    Medication == "Ibuprofen" ~ "Ibuprofen",
    Medication == "Acetaminophen" ~ "Acetaminophen",
    Medication == "Naproxen" ~ "Naproxen",
    Medication == "Celebrex" ~ "Celebrex",
    Medication == "Prescription_Pain_Relievers" ~ "Prescription Pain Relievers",
    Medication == "None" ~ "None",
    Medication == "Skipped" ~ "Skipped this Question"
  ))


mds_summary <- mds_long %>%
  group_by(Medication) %>%
  summarise(Frequency = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Percentage = Frequency / sum(Frequency) * 100)


mds_summary %>%
  gt::gt() %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Percentage", decimals = 2) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Frequency", use_seps = TRUE, decimals = 0) %>%
  tab_header(title = md("PAINREL1: Pain Relievers Used 4x a Month for 6+ Months")) %>%
  cols_label(Frequency = md("**N**"),
             Medication = md("**Medications**"),
             Percentage = md("**%**")) %>%
  grand_summary_rows(
    columns = c(Frequency, Percentage),
    fns = list(Total = ~sum(.)),
    decimals = 0
  ) %>%
  tab_options(stub.font.weight = "bold") %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
    locations = cells_body(columns = Medication)
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    md("Participants may select multiple responses or skip the question."),
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = Percentage),
    placement = "left"
  )
```

```{r Fert4, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}



dtfert4 <- fb %>% filter(D_424047361 == 353358909)


preg_iss_flags <- dtfert4 %>%
  mutate(
    Tubal_blockage = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_342735868 == 1),
    Ovary_or_hormone_problem = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_990599372 == 1),
    Endometriosis = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_863286658 == 1),
    Cervical_mucus = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_202355614 == 1),
    Partners_infertility = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_201434907 == 1),
    Not_looked_into = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_570171052 == 1),
    No_cause_found = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_498799217 == 1),
    Other = as.numeric(D_548355426_D_548355426_D_807835037 == 1),
    # Ensure numeric conversion for rowSums
    Skipped = if_else(
      rowSums(select(., starts_with("D_548355426_D_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)), na.rm = TRUE) == 0 &
        rowSums(!is.na(select(., starts_with("D_548355426_D_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)))) == 0,1,0))


preg_iss_long <- preg_iss_flags %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Tubal_blockage"):starts_with("Skipped"),
               names_to = "Issue", values_to = "Flag") %>%
  filter(Flag == 1) %>%
  mutate(Issue = case_when(
    Issue == "Tubal_blockage" ~ "Tubal blockage",
    Issue == "Ovary_or_hormone_problem" ~ "Ovary or hormone problem",
    Issue == "Endometriosis" ~ "Endometriosis",
    Issue == "Cervical_mucus" ~ "Cervical mucus",
    Issue == "Partners_infertility" ~ "Partner's infertility",
    Issue == "Not_looked_into" ~ "Not looked into",
    Issue == "No_cause_found" ~ "No cause found",
    Issue == "Other" ~ "Other",
    Issue == "Skipped" ~ "Skipped this Question"
  ))


preg_iss_summary <- preg_iss_long %>%
  group_by(Issue) %>%
  summarise(Frequency = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Percentage = Frequency / sum(Frequency) * 100)


preg_iss_summary %>%
  gt::gt() %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Percentage", decimals = 2) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Frequency", use_seps = TRUE, decimals = 0) %>%
  tab_header(title = md("FERT4: Issue preventing pregnancy")) %>%
  cols_label(Frequency = md("**N**"),
             Issue = md("**Issue**"),
             Percentage = md("**%**")) %>%
  grand_summary_rows(
    columns = c(Frequency, Percentage),
    fns = list(Total = ~sum(.)),
    decimals = 0
  ) %>%
  tab_options(stub.font.weight = "bold") %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
    locations = cells_body(columns = Issue)
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    md("Participants may select multiple responses or skip the question."),
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = Percentage),
    placement = "left"
  )
```

```{r Fert6, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
    Serophene = as.numeric(D_881200765_D_881200765_D_372219003 == 1),
    Synarel = as.numeric(D_881200765_D_881200765_D_743731422 == 1),
    Other = as.numeric(D_881200765_D_881200765_D_807835037 == 1),
    None_of_the_above = as.numeric(D_881200765_D_881200765_D_535003378 == 1),
    # Flag for skipped questions when all are 0 or NA
    Skipped = if_else(
      rowSums(select(., starts_with("D_881200765_D_881200765_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)), na.rm = TRUE) == 0 &
        rowSums(!is.na(select(., starts_with("D_881200765_D_881200765_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)))) == 0,1,0))


fert_med_long <- fert_med_flags %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Chlomid"):starts_with("Skipped"),
               names_to = "Medication", values_to = "Flag") %>%
  filter(Flag == 1) %>%
  mutate(Medication = case_when(
    Medication == "Chlomid" ~ "Chlomid",
    Medication == "Injectables" ~ "Injectables",
    Medication == "Danazol" ~ "Danazol",
    Medication == "Danocrine" ~ "Danocrine",
    Medication == "Hcg" ~ "Hcg",
    Medication == "Milophene" ~ "Milophene",
    Medication == "Lupron_depot" ~ "Lupron depot",
    Medication == "Nolyadex" ~ "Nolyadex",
    Medication == "Pergonal" ~ "Pergonal",
    Medication == "Serophene" ~ "Serophene",
    Medication == "Synarel" ~ "Synarel",
    Medication == "Other" ~ "Other",
    Medication == "None_of_the_above" ~ "None of the above",
    Medication == "Skipped" ~ "Skipped this Question"
  ))


fert_med_summary <- fert_med_long %>%
  group_by(Medication) %>%
  summarise(Frequency = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Percentage = Frequency / sum(Frequency) * 100)


fert_med_summary %>%
  gt::gt() %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Percentage", decimals = 2) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Frequency", use_seps = TRUE, decimals = 0) %>%
  tab_header(title = md("FERT6: Used these fertility medications")) %>%
  cols_label(Frequency = md("**N**"),
             Medication = md("**Medication**"),
             Percentage = md("**%**")) %>%
  grand_summary_rows(
    columns = c(Frequency, Percentage),
    fns = list(Total = ~sum(.)),
    decimals = 0
  ) %>%
  tab_options(stub.font.weight = "bold") %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
    locations = cells_body(columns = Medication)
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    md("Participants may select multiple responses or skip the question."),
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = Percentage),
    placement = "left"
  )
```

```{r Test2, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}



dtTESTTHER2 <- data_tib_m2 %>%  filter(D_111235606 == 353358909)


test_med_flags <- dtTESTTHER2 %>% 
  mutate(
    Gel_Cream_Testosterone = as.numeric(D_946849196_D_729863969 == 1),
    Testosterone_Injection = as.numeric(D_946849196_D_108104748 == 1),
    Testosterone_Skin_Patch = as.numeric(D_946849196_D_717308596 == 1),
    Testosterone_Pills = as.numeric(D_946849196_D_746788766 == 1),
    Gum_Inner_cheek_Patch_Testosterone = as.numeric(D_946849196_D_158214723 == 1),
    Slow_Release_Implant_Testosterone = as.numeric(D_946849196_D_658810736 == 1),
    Skipped = if_else(rowSums(select(., starts_with("D_946849196_D_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)), na.rm = TRUE) == 0 &
                      rowSums(!is.na(select(., starts_with("D_946849196_D_")))) == 0, 1, 0)
  )


test_med_long <- test_med_flags %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Gel_Cream_Testosterone"):starts_with("Skipped"),
               names_to = "Medication", values_to = "Flag") %>%
  filter(Flag == 1) %>%
  mutate(Medication = case_when(
    Medication == "Gel_Cream_Testosterone" ~ "Gel/Cream Testosterone",
    Medication == "Testosterone_Injection" ~ "Testosterone Injection",
    Medication == "Testosterone_Skin_Patch" ~ "Testosterone Skin Patch",
    Medication == "Testosterone_Pills" ~ "Testosterone Pills",
    Medication == "Gum_Inner_cheek_Patch_Testosterone" ~ "Gum or Inner-cheek Patch Testosterone",
    Medication == "Slow_Release_Implant_Testosterone" ~ "Slow Release Implant Testosterone",
    Medication == "Skipped" ~ "Skipped this Question"
  ))


test_med_summary <- test_med_long %>% 
  group_by(Medication) %>%
  summarise(Frequency = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Percentage = Frequency / sum(Frequency) * 100)


test_med_summary %>%
  gt::gt() %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Percentage", decimals = 2) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Frequency", use_seps = TRUE, decimals = 0) %>%
  tab_header(title = md("TESTTHER2: Testosterone Medication Forms")) %>%
  cols_label(Frequency = md("**N**"),
             Medication = md("**Medication**"),
             Percentage = md("**%**")) %>%
  grand_summary_rows(
    columns = c(Frequency, Percentage),
    fns = list(Total = ~sum(.)),
    decimals = 0
  ) %>%
  tab_options(stub.font.weight = "bold") %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
    locations = cells_body(columns = Medication)
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    md("Participants may select multiple responses or skip the question."),
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = Percentage),
    placement = "left"
  )


```

```{r Exercise, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Separate activity as a select all that apply, can choose more then one
ex_flags <- data_tib_m2 %>%
  mutate(
    Walk = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_904954920 == 1),
    Run = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_619501806 == 1),
    Play_Tennis = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_203192394 == 1),
    Play_Golf = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_261267696 == 1),
    Swim = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_926584500 == 1),
    Bike = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_420058896 == 1),
    Strength_Training = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_868685663 == 1),
    Yoga = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_760484278 == 1),
    Martial_Arts = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_345916806 == 1),
    Dance = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_936042582 == 1),
    Ski = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_182827107 == 1),
    Cross_Country = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_734860227 == 1),
    Surfing = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_371531887 == 1),
    Circuit = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_423631576 == 1),
    Other = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_181769837 == 1),
    None_of_the_Above = as.numeric(D_517976064_D_535003378 == 1),
    Skipped = if_else(rowSums(select(., starts_with("D_517976064_D_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)), na.rm = TRUE) == 0 &
                      rowSums(!is.na(select(., starts_with("D_517976064_D_")))) == 0, 1, 0))



ex_long <- ex_flags %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Walk"):starts_with("Skipped"),
               names_to = "Activity", values_to = "Flag") %>%
  filter(Flag == 1) %>%
  mutate(Activity = case_when(
    Activity == "Walk" ~ "Walk",
    Activity == "Run" ~ "Run",
    Activity == "Play_Tennis" ~ "Play Tennis",
    Activity == "Play_Golf" ~ "Play Golf",
    Activity == "Swim" ~ "Swim",
    Activity == "Bike" ~ "Bike",
    Activity == "Strength_Training" ~ "Strength Training",
    Activity == "Yoga" ~ "Yoga",
    Activity == "Martial_Arts" ~ "Martial Arts",
    Activity == "Dance" ~ "Dance",
    Activity == "Ski" ~ "Ski",
    Activity == "Cross_Country" ~ "Cross Country",
    Activity == "Surfing" ~ "Surfing",
    Activity == "Circuit" ~ "Circuit",
    Activity == "Other" ~ "Other",
    Activity == "None_of_the_Above" ~ "None of the Above",
    Activity == "Skipped" ~ "Skipped this Question"
  ))


dt_exercise_summary <- ex_long %>%
  group_by(Activity) %>%
  summarise(Frequency = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Percentage = Frequency / sum(Frequency) * 100)


dt_exercise_summary %>%
  gt::gt() %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Percentage", decimals = 2) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Frequency", use_seps = TRUE, decimals = 0) %>%
  tab_header(title = md("EXEREC1: Done any of these Exercises or Recreational Activities in the Past Year")) %>%
  cols_label(Frequency = md("**N**"),
             Activity = md("**Activity**"),
             Percentage = md("**%**")) %>%
  tab_options(stub.font.weight = "bold") %>%
  tab_style(style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
            locations = cells_body(columns = Activity)) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    md("As this is a select all question, participants may select multiple responses."),

  )
```

## Lawn, Garden, and Home Repair
```{r Lawn, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

# Individually count lawn events since it's select all that apply 
chore_flags <- data_tib_m2 %>%
  mutate(
    Moderate_Chores = as.numeric(D_204421360_D_797221287 == 1),
    Vigorous_Chores = as.numeric(D_204421360_D_500744195 == 1),
    Home_Repair = as.numeric(D_204421360_D_383015037 == 1),
    None_of_the_Above = as.numeric(D_204421360_D_535003378 == 1),
    Skipped = if_else(rowSums(select(., starts_with("D_204421360_D_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)), na.rm = TRUE) == 0 &
                      rowSums(!is.na(select(., starts_with("D_204421360_D_")))) == 0, 1, 0))


chore_long <- chore_flags %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Moderate_Chores"):starts_with("Skipped"),
               names_to = "Chore", values_to = "Flag") %>%
  filter(Flag == 1) %>%
  mutate(Chore = case_when(
    Chore == "Moderate_Chores" ~ "Moderate Chores",
    Chore == "Vigorous_Chores" ~ "Vigorous Chores",
    Chore == "Home_Repair" ~ "Home Repair",
    Chore == "None_of_the_Above" ~ "None of the Above",
    Chore == "Skipped" ~ "Skipped this Question"
  ))


dtLAWN1_summary <- chore_long %>%
  group_by(Chore) %>%
  summarise(Frequency = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Percentage = Frequency / sum(Frequency) * 100)


dtLAWN1_summary %>%
  gt::gt() %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Percentage", decimals = 2) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Frequency", use_seps = TRUE, decimals = 0) %>%
  tab_header(title = md("LAWN1: Lawn, Garden, and Home Repair Activities")) %>%
  cols_label(Frequency = md("**N**"),
             Chore = md("**Chores**"),
             Percentage = md("**%**")) %>%
  grand_summary_rows(
    columns = c(Frequency, Percentage),
    fns = list(Total = ~sum(.)),
    decimals = 0
  ) %>%
  tab_options(stub.font.weight = "bold") %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
    locations = cells_body(columns = Chore)
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    md("Participants may select multiple responses or skip the question."),
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = Percentage),
    placement = "left"
  )


```

## Sleep Problems

```{r SleepTable, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}


slp_cond_flags <- data_tib_m2 %>%
  mutate(
    Sleep_Apnea = as.numeric(D_479628567_D_370923702 == 1),
    Insomnia = as.numeric(D_479628567_D_495144424 == 1),
    Restless_Legs = as.numeric(D_479628567_D_728393970 == 1),
    Narcolepsy = as.numeric(D_479628567_D_531811052 == 1),
    None_of_the_Above = as.numeric(D_479628567_D_535003378 == 1),
    # Skipped: flag if all condition columns are 0 or NA
    Skipped = if_else(rowSums(select(., starts_with("D_479628567_D_")) %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric)), na.rm = TRUE) == 0 &
                      rowSums(!is.na(select(., starts_with("D_479628567_D_")))) == 0, 1, 0)
  )


slp_cond_long <- slp_cond_flags %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Sleep_Apnea"):starts_with("Skipped"),
               names_to = "Condition", values_to = "Flag") %>%
  filter(Flag == 1) %>%
  mutate(Condition = case_when(
    Condition == "Sleep_Apnea" ~ "Sleep Apnea",
    Condition == "Insomnia" ~ "Insomnia",
    Condition == "Restless_Legs" ~ "Restless Legs",
    Condition == "Narcolepsy" ~ "Narcolepsy",
    Condition == "None_of_the_Above" ~ "None of the Above",
    Condition == "Skipped" ~ "Skipped this Question"
  ))


slp_cond_summary <- slp_cond_long %>%
  group_by(Condition) %>%
  summarise(Frequency = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Percentage = Frequency / sum(Frequency) * 100)


slp_cond_summary %>%
  gt::gt() %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Percentage", decimals = 2) %>%
  fmt_number(columns = "Frequency", use_seps = TRUE, decimals = 0) %>%
  tab_header(title = md("SLPROB1: Diagnosed with Conditions")) %>%
  cols_label(Frequency = md("**N**"),
             Condition = md("**Conditions**"),
             Percentage = md("**%**")) %>%
  grand_summary_rows(
    columns = c(Frequency, Percentage),
    fns = list(Total = ~sum(.)),
    decimals = 0
  ) %>%
  tab_options(stub.font.weight = "bold") %>%
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold")),
    locations = cells_body(columns = Condition)
  ) %>%
  tab_footnote(
    md("Participants may select multiple responses or skip the question."),
    locations = cells_column_labels(columns = Percentage),
    placement = "left"
  )


```
